rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0001
rows.name: Honey, we're home![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0002
rows.name: Yes, very amusing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0003
rows.name: Who wants a fresh cup of tea?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thank you, Ms. Koo, but I can't stay long. I just wanted
to pass along a request from your commanding officer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Commander Vandham? Hmm...
Does it have anything to do with our new arrival?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0006
rows.name: Correct.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
He stopped by while you were out on your tour.
He said he'll come back, but that I shouldn't wait to ask you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0008
rows.name: Heh. Here we go. I bet I can guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0009
rows.name: You probably can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0010
rows.name:
He wants to fast-track our new friend here
for BLADE duty with a training assignment.[ST:page p1=120 ]"What in the hell are we waitin' for?!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0011
rows.name: ...As he put it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0012
rows.name: The Commander does have a way with words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0013
rows.name: Makes even my pitch sound smooth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0014
rows.name:
I explained about the memory issues,
but he didn't see it as a problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0015
rows.name:
And to be honest, given our current need
for BLADE recruits, I can't say I entirely disagree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Hey, it's not me you need to convince.
BLADE service is voluntary, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0017
rows.name: Of course. And I would never force or coerce anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Well, friend? What do you say?
Can we count on you to do your part?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: xs02010100_SEL0011
rows.name: Look into Nagi's eyes and nod firmly.

rows.label: xs02010100_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: xs02010100_SEL0021
rows.name: Shrug your shoulders and shake your head.

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0019
rows.name:
I knew you'd make the right choice.
Welcome to the organization.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0020_m
rows.name:
Elma, he can start on your team.
You'll begin training immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0020_f
rows.name:
Elma, she can start on your team.
You'll begin training immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0021
rows.name: Yes, Mr. Secretary. With pleasure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0022
rows.name: All right! Welcome to the cool kids' club![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0023
rows.name: Ms. Koo, how much do you know about lifepods?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0024
rows.name: Lifepods? You mean, like, from the White Whale?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0025_m
rows.name:
Yes, those lifepods.
Like the one Elma—a BLADE—rescued our friend here from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0025_f
rows.name:
Yes, those lifepods.
Like the one Elma—a BLADE—rescued our friend here from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0026
rows.name: Emphasis on the word "rescued."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0026_2
rows.name:
Because, if you aren't released,
you just sit there frozen in stasis. Forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0027
rows.name:
So did you have an engineering question about lifepods?
...Or is this all part of the guilt trip?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0028
rows.name: I'm sure I have no idea what you're talking about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0028_2
rows.name: Now what'll it be, friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Now, you wouldn't want to refuse the people
who saved your life, would you? Friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0030
rows.name: You said no, you wouldn't refuse—that's a yes, right?[ST:wait ]
